channel.title: The GrillOut
channel.description: Inspired by late 90s and early 2000s fansites of yore, The GrillOut is a place you can expect essays, reviews, and general musings with a focus on anime, cartoons, and generally obscure media.

item.title: Watch Once PileÂ© - In & Out
item.description: Is this old 90s flick a dumpster fire or a delight?

item.title: Tomcat's Big Adventure - An Anime Rarity at The Beacon
item.description: Explore this lost anime gem and its showing at The Beacon!

item.title: The Good, The Bad, and the Horny: Spring Anime 2025 Preview Guide
item.description: This NFT and AI fueled disaster contains themes and tropes best left burning in a dumpster fire.

item.title: The Good, The Bad, and the Horny: Spring Anime 2025 Preview Guide
item.description: Get early impressions on the lewder anime releases of the Spring 2025 season from a certified hentai master!

item.title: You Should Show Grave of the Fireflies to Your Kids
item.description: Viral posts online suggest Grave of the Fireflies should never be shown to kids. Here's why they are wrong.

item.title: I Am A Dog: Don Matsugoro on Bettering Our World
item.description: I Am A Dog: Don Matsugorou's Life is a forgotten anime that would have been an equally forgetable special to watch if not for a surprisingly radical moment that expoused leftist themes.

item.title: Delicious in Dungeon: Oppression, War, and the Power of Bread
item.description: I started watching Delicious in Dungeon properly today simply expecting some excellent entertainment while loom knitting. I ended up getting a fantastic reminder about how a single episode of anime can be what sparks education and discussion about history, current events, and the struggles of oppressed people. It was specifically episode four, "Stewed Cabbage/Orcs," that caught my eye. Specifically, it was the dish not mentioned in the title that was of the most importance: Bread.

item.title: Transphobia Should Be Maintained in Adaptations: A Trans Perspective
item.description: The changes made for the dub of Lovely★Complex deserve scrutiny but not for the reasons you might expect.
